resources.string: "Lindungi smartphone anda, karena pada ponsel anda menyimpan banyak informasi sensitif daripada dompet anda. Sedikit usaha extra dapat membantu dalam menjaga keamaan informasi pribadi anda".
Tempat menyimpan dan mengelola data pribadi secara terenkripsi
Meminta bantuan kepada kerabat terdekat ketika terjadi hal-hal yang tidak diinginkan
Fitur untuk menyimpan dan mengelola data pribadi secara terenkripsi.
Fitur ini dapat meminta bantuan dari kerabat terdekat Anda ketika terjadi masalah.
Fitur yang dapat mengirim pesan ke kontak yang telah ditentukan sebelumnya ketika smartphone terjatuh.
Fitur ini memberikan edukasi dan pelatihan bagi pengguna ponsel pintar tentang cara menjaga keamanan perangkat mereka.
The hardware is unavailable. Try again later.
The sensor was unable to process the current image.
The current operation has been running too long and has timed out.
The operation can\'t be completed because there is not enough device storage remaining.
The operation was canceled by the user or because the biometric sensor is unavailable.
The operation was canceled because the biometrics is locked out due to too many attempts. This occurs after 5 failed attempts, and lasts for 30 seconds.
The operation failed due to a vendor-specific error.
Wrong biometrics too many times. Use device credential to unlock.
The Device does not have any biometrics enrolled.
The device does not have the required authentication hardware.
The device does not have pin, pattern, or password set up.
A security vulnerability has been discovered with one or more hardware sensors. The affected sensor(s) are unavailable until a security update has addressed the issue.
